i.name: Petricite Burst
i.description: After casting a spell, Sylas's next basic attack whirls his energized chains around him dealing bonus magic damage to enemies hit.

q.name: Chain Lash
q.description:
Sylas lashes his chains out, intersecting at his targeted location dealing damage to and slowing enemies.

After a delay, magical energy explodes from the intersection point dealing damage and increasing the slow.

w.name: Kingslayer
w.description: Sylas lunges at an enemy with magical force dealing execute based damage and healing himself against enemy champions.

e.name: Abscond / Abduct
e.description: Sylas dashes and gains a shield. Sylas can recast the ability to throw his chains out, pulling himself to an enemy he hits.

r.name: Hijack
r.description: Sylas steals the enemy's ultimate ability and can cast it freely.

description: {{sbc|Innate:}} After casting an ability, '''Sylas'''' next basic attack within 4 seconds is modified to whirl his chains around him, dealing {{pp|5 to 48|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 100% AD)}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to the target and nearby enemies.
i1.name: Petricite Burst
notes: * ''Petricite Burst'' cannot {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}}.
* {{ii|Sheen|Spellblade}} damage will get converted to magic damage but will deal its damage only to the primary target.

riot.name: Petricite Burst
riot.description: After casting a spell, Sylas's next basic attack whirls his energized chains around him dealing bonus magic damage to enemies hit.

riot.name: Chain Lash
riot.description:
Sylas lashes his chains out, intersecting at his targeted location dealing damage to and slowing enemies.

After a delay, magical energy explodes from the intersection point dealing damage and increasing the slow.
riot.tooltip:
Sylas lashes his chains out in an X-shaped area, intersecting at his targeted location dealing {{ damage }} magic damage to and slowing enemies by {{ slowamountcalc }} for 2 seconds.

After .5 seconds, magical energy explodes from the intersection point dealing {{ explosiondamage }} and increasing the slow by 50%.

The explosion deals {{ minionmodcalc }} damage to minions.

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sylas''' lashes out with his chains that converge to the target location and extend beyond it up to a maximum range, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies hit for 2 seconds.

After a {{fd|0.5}}-seconds delay, the chains' intersection detonates with the same {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slows}} enemies hit by 50% for 2 seconds. Against {{tip|minions}} the detonation deals 45% reduced damage.
q1.effect_radius: {{tt|180|Detonation radius against champions}} / {{tt|200|Detonation radius against minions and monsters}}
leveling: {{st|Maximum Non-Minion Damage|{{ap|45*2 to 145*2}} {{as|(+ 120% AP)}}|Maximum Minion Damage|{{ap|45+45*0.55 to 145+145*0.55}} {{as|(+ 93% AP)}}}}
q1.name: Chain Lash
notes: * No additional details.

riot.name: Kingslayer
riot.description: Sylas lunges at an enemy with magical force dealing execute based damage and healing himself against enemy champions.
riot.tooltip:
Sylas lunges at an enemy with magical force dealing {{ mindamage }} magic damage, increased to {{ maxdamage }} if the enemy is below 40% health.

Damaging enemy champions heals Sylas for {{ minhealing }}, increased to {{ maxhealing }} if Sylas is below 40% health.

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sylas''' {{tip|dash|lunges}} at a target enemy with a powerful strike, dealing {{as|magic damage}}, increased by 50% against targets {{as|{{sti|health|'''below''' 40% health}}}}.
Against {{tip|champion|enemy champions}}, '''Sylas''' is {{tip|heal|healed}}, doubled if he's {{as|{{sti|health|'''below''' 40% health}}}}.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|60 to 180}} {{as|(+ 65% AP)}}|Increased Damage|{{ap|60*1.5 to 180*1.5}} {{as|(+ {{fd|97.5}}% AP)}}}}
w1.name: Kingslayer
notes: * Icon border glows when he is within the maximum healing threshold.
* ''Kingslayer'' is able to make allied {{ci|Illaoi}} {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God|Illaoi|Tentacles}} slam (including those spawned by a hijacked {{ai|Leap of Faith|Illaoi}}).
** The tentacle attacks will regenerate '''Sylas's''' {{as|health}} and give him the {{g}} for its kills.
** ''Kingslayer'' is unable to queue up tentacle attacks (commanding them to attack while they're already attacking will not make them attack a second time).

riot.name: Abscond / Abduct
riot.description: Sylas dashes and gains a shield. Sylas can recast the ability to throw his chains out, pulling himself to an enemy he hits.
riot.tooltip:
Sylas dashes to a location, Shielding himself for {{ shieldvalue }} for {{ shieldduration }} seconds.

Recast: Sylas throws out his chain in a direction, pulling himself to the first enemy hit dealing {{ damage }} magic damage and knocking them up for .5 seconds.

description: {{sbc|First Cast - Abscond:}} '''Sylas''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} forward to the target location, {{sti|shield|link=true|shielding}} himself for 2 seconds and resetting his basic attack timer.
For the next {{fd|3.5}} seconds, '''Sylas''' may cast ''Abduct''.

{{sbc|Second Cast - Abduct:}} '''Sylas''' whips out his chains in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} the first enemy hit, {{tip|dash|pulling}} himself towards them, and {{tip|airborne|knocking}} them up for {{fd|0.5}} seconds upon arrival.
e1.name: Abscond / Abduct
notes: * No additional details

riot.name: Abscond / Abduct
riot.description: Sylas dashes and gains a shield. Sylas can recast the ability to throw his chains out, pulling himself to an enemy he hits.
riot.tooltip:
Sylas dashes to a location, Shielding himself for {{ shieldvalue }} for {{ shieldduration }} seconds.

Recast: Sylas throws out his chain in a direction, pulling himself to the first enemy hit dealing {{ damage }} magic damage and knocking them up for .5 seconds.

description: {{sbc|First Cast - Abscond:}} '''Sylas''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} forward to the target location, {{sti|shield|link=true|shielding}} himself for 2 seconds and resetting his basic attack timer.
For the next {{fd|3.5}} seconds, '''Sylas''' may cast ''Abduct''.

{{sbc|Second Cast - Abduct:}} '''Sylas''' whips out his chains in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} the first enemy hit, {{tip|dash|pulling}} himself towards them, and {{tip|airborne|knocking}} them up for {{fd|0.5}} seconds upon arrival.
e2.name: Abscond / Abduct
notes: * No additional details

riot.name: Hijack
riot.description: Sylas steals the enemy's ultimate ability and can cast it freely.
riot.tooltip:
Sylas hijacks a targeted enemy, allowing him to cast their ultimate ability as they would cast it, based on his Ultimate level and using his stats.

Hijacking an enemy places a cooldown on them for 200% (modified by Sylas' Cooldown Reduction, minimum 20 seconds) of the enemy's ultimate's cooldown, during which time Sylas cannot hijack them again.

Sylas converts non-hybrid AD ratios into AP ratios, granting him .5 AP: 1 Bonus AD and .7 AP: 1 Total AD respectively.

r1.custominfo: {{tt|200% of target's ultimate cooldown|A minimum of 20 seconds cooldown. Starts on steal, rather than on casting the stolen ability.}}
r1.customlabel: {{tt|On-Target Cooldown|This can be reduced by Sylas' cooldown reduction.}}
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} While ''Hijack'' is available, '''Sylas''' can select a target enemy champion to gain a copy of their ultimate ability at the cost of mana. '''Sylas''' cannot select the same champion again for a set duration, and can hold the hijacked ultimate for 2 minutes.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Sylas''' casts his hijacked ultimate ability without cost, scaling based on ''Hijack's'' rank and his own statistics.

All ''Hijacked'' ultimates and abilities that do not scale with {{as|ability power}} have their {{as|attack damage}} ratios converted to {{as|ability power}} ratios, scaling with {{as|{{fd|0.7}}% AP}} per {{as|1% '''total''' AD}}, and {{as|{{fd|0.5}}% AP}} per {{as|1% '''bonus''' AD}}.
r1.name: Hijack
notes: * ''Hijack'' will copy all components of the ability: passives and actives as well as recast effects. ''Hijack'' will not trigger the effects of other abilities unless absolutely necessary.

* Shape-shifting ultimates will transform '''Sylas''' into the target's alternate form, replacing his basic abilities. Namely: {{ai|Aspect of the Cougar|Nidalee|Cougar Form}}, {{ai|Spider Form|Elise}}, {{ai|Transform Mercury Cannon|Jayce|Cannon Form}} and {{ai|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana|Dragon Form}}.

** Dragon's Descent refreshes '''Sylas's''' mana and causes it to deplete at a rate of {{as|5% maximum mana}} per second, for a minimum duration of 20 seconds. '''Sylas''' will restore mana on his attacks at the same rate as Shyvana's fury generation, and other sources of mana restoration will extend the duration as well. At the end of the effect, '''Sylas''' gains his previous mana.
** Permanent transformations last for ~5 minutes or until toggled off.
** The alternate abilities of transforming champions will cost mana and scale with the ranks as appropriate for the ability (e.g. ranks in R for Nidalee and ranks in Q/W/E for Jayce/Elise).
** {{ai|Petricite Burst|Sylas}} will still be triggered from abilities cast in alternate forms.

* Ultimates comply with [[One For All]] rules if an ally is playing the hijacked champion. For example, an allied {{cai|Hemorrhage|Darius}} stacks will increase the damage of the hijacked Noxian Guillotine; or an allied {{cai|Dark Sphere|Syndra}} will add extra damage to hijacked Unleashed Power as well as producing 3 spheres that she can use. One For All restrictions apply as well, such as only spawning a single {{ai|Dragon Force|Mordekaiser}}.
;Notable Interactions
* {{cai|Feast|Cho'Gath}} - Gains permanent ''Feast'' charges on-kill.
* {{cai|Missile Barrage|Corki}} - Gains max charges.
* {{cai|Noxian Guillotine|Darius}} - Does not gain {{ai|Hemorrhage|Darius}} and so the ultimate deals minimal damage.
* {{cai|Grand Challenge|Fiora}} - Gains movement speed in the effect and can trigger the area healing, but Vitals do not deal bonus damage.
* {{cai|Cannon Barrage|Gangplank}} - Does not steal cannon upgrades.
* {{cai|GNAR!|Gnar}} - Gains a usable ultimate even if Mini Gnar is targeted.
* {{cai|UPGRADE!!!|Heimerdinger}} - '''Sylas's''' basic abilities are replaced with ''Heimerdinger's'' empowered abilities.
* {{cai|Leap of Faith|Illaoi}} - Spawns tentacles and can make them slam with {{ai|Kingslayer|Sylas}} but does not reduce its cooldown.

* {{cai|Killer Instinct|Kai'Sa}} - '''Sylas'''' basic attacks, {{ai|Abscond / Abduct|Sylas}} and nearby allies' {{tip|immobilize|immobilizations}} apply stacks of {{ai|Second Skin|Kai'Sa|Plasma}}, up to 4. '''Sylas''' is unable to apply the 5th stack necessary to expunge the stacks.
* {{cai|Fate's Call|Kalista}} - '''Sylas''' begins the game with {{ii|The Black Spear}}.
* {{cai|Mantra|Karma}} - '''Sylas's''' basic abilities are replaced with ''Karma's'' empowered abilities.
* {{cai|Umbral Trespass|Kayn}} - Based on current form.
* {{cai|Void Assault|Kha'Zix}} - Based on current evolution.
* {{cai|Chaaaaaaaarge!!!|Kled}} - Does not need mount.
* {{cai|Mimic|LeBlanc}} - Uses the empowered version of ''LeBlanc's'' last cast basic ability. If she has not cast any spells, {{ai|Mimic Sigil of Malice|LeBlanc}} is copied.
* {{cai|Highlander|Master Yi}} - Kills do not reduce Sylas' basic ability cooldowns.
* {{cai|Command: Shockwave|Orianna}} - Self-cast.
* {{cai|The Quickness|Rakan}} - PENDING: Attack range reductions and such.
* {{cai|Thrill of the Hunt|Rengar}} - '''Sylas''' will gain {{ai|Unseen Predator|Rengar}} on his next attack.
* {{cai|Demonic Ascension|Swain}} - '''Sylas''' always has full soul fragments regardless of how many Swain has.
* {{cai|Hijack|Sylas}} - Steals the ability that the enemy ''Sylas'' has stolen. Cannot be targeted if no ability has been stolen.
* {{cai|Unleashed Power|Syndra}} - Throws the minimum of 3 spheres, which are left on the ground afterwards.
* {{cai|Noxious Trap|Teemo}} - Gains max charges.

* {{cai|Spray and Pray|Twitch}} - Gains 300 attack range and his attacks produce missiles that travel 850 range. These attacks are classified as melee, and so will trigger effects such as Tiamat versus every target.
* {{ci|Udyr}} - Steals {{ai|Phoenix Stance|Udyr}}. Lasts for 2 empowered attacks.
* {{cai|Final Hour|Vayne}} - Gains the {{as|AD}} and {{as|MS}} bonuses. Additionally, '''Sylas''' gains {{tip|invisibility}} when he casts  {{ai|Chain Lash|Sylas}}.
* {{cai|Life Form Disintegration Ray|Vel'Koz}} - Does not apply {{ai|Organic Deconstruction|Vel'Koz}}.
* {{cai|Chaos Storm|Viktor}} - PENDING: Does he steal the Hex Core evolution?
* {{cai|Death Mark|Zed}} - Shadow does not mimic spells but can be reactivated to swap places.
* {{cai|Portal Jump|Zoe}} - '''Sylas''' can use his spells for the 1 second at the target location, but not during the jump.
